name: PostDates
author: ekajogja

sections.description: PostDates allows you to easily display the publication and last update dates for your content. It includes a settings page where you can configure which dates to show and their position.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/postdates directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Settings -> PostDates screen to configure the plugin.
sections.faq:
How do I change the position of the dates?

Go to the plugin settings page and select the desired position (above or below the content).
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • Initial release of the PostDates plugin.
  • Features include displaying publication and last update dates on posts, pages, and custom post types.
  • Added settings page to configure date display options.
  • Added option to choose the position of dates (above or below the content).

short_description: Display the publication and last update dates on your posts, pages, and custom post types. You can choose which dates and its location.
description: PostDates allows you to easily display the publication and last update dates for your content. It includes a settings page where you can configure which dates to show and their position.
